title: Add user authentication and multi-tenant data isolation
description:
Add user registration and login functionality so each user has their own isolated inventory data.

## Requirements
- **Registration**: New users can create an account (email/password)
- **Login**: Users authenticate to access the app
- **Data isolation**: Each user only sees/manages their own inventory items
- **Session management**: Secure session handling with proper logout

## Technical Considerations
- Add users table with password hashing (bcrypt)
- Add user_id foreign key to inventory tables
- Implement JWT or session-based auth
- Protect all API endpoints with auth middleware
- Update frontend with login/register pages

title: Set up Azure OIDC authentication for GitHub Actions
description:
Configure federated identity credentials so GitHub Actions can deploy to Azure without storing secrets.

## Tasks
- Create Microsoft Entra app registration
- Configure federated credential for main branch
- Assign Contributor role at subscription level
- Add GitHub secrets: AZURE_CLIENT_ID, AZURE_TENANT_ID, AZURE_SUBSCRIPTION_ID
- Test with az account show workflow

## Reference
https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/azure/azure-resource-manager/bicep/deploy-github-actions
notes: OIDC may not be needed if we deploy locally via script. Re-evaluate after CI fix and deploy script are done.

title: Fix broken CI/CD pipeline
description:
CI pipeline is broken and needs immediate attention.

## Issues to investigate
- Tests failing in CI
- Linter not running correctly
- Coverage requirements may be misconfigured

## Acceptance Criteria
- All tests pass in CI
- Linting passes
- CI completes successfully on push to master
notes: Tests pass, lint passes. Docker build job times out due to HuggingFace model download (~90MB). Decision: Remove build job from CI entirely. Docker builds will be done locally via deploy script.

title: Rebase and squash CI commits on master
description:
The master branch has accumulated messy CI iteration commits that should be squashed/rebased into cleaner commits. This will make the git history more readable and maintainable.

## Tasks
- Review commits on master that are CI-related iterations
- Interactive rebase to squash related commits
- Force push cleaned history (coordinate with team if needed)

## Lesson Learned
Use feature branches + PRs for CI/CD work to avoid polluting master with iteration commits.

title: Create local deploy script with tear down and stand up
description:
Create scripts/deploy.sh that builds Docker image locally and pushes to ACR. This avoids HuggingFace timeout issues in GitHub Actions.

## Script should support:
- **Build**: Build Docker image locally
- **Push**: Push to ACR
- **Stand up**: Deploy/update Container Apps
- **Tear down**: Remove deployed resources (for cleanup/redeployment)

## Commands
- ./scripts/deploy.sh build - Build image
- ./scripts/deploy.sh push - Push to ACR
- ./scripts/deploy.sh up - Deploy to Azure
- ./scripts/deploy.sh down - Tear down resources
- ./scripts/deploy.sh all - Full deploy (build + push + up)
